00112                         Value(std::string json) throw (Json::Exception)
00113                         {
00114                                 json = this->strip(json);
00115                                 this->parse(json);
00116                         };

00123                         ~Value()
00124                         {
00125                                 switch (this->type) {
00126                                 case JVOBJECT:
00127                                         this->deleteObject(this->asObject());
00128                                         break;
00129                                 case JVARRAY:
00130                                         this->deleteArray(this->asArray());
00131                                         break;
00132                                 default:
00133                                         break;
00134                                 }
00135                         };

00342                         static void deleteObject(Json::Object obj)
00343                         {
00344                                 for (Json::Object::iterator it = obj.begin(); it != obj.end(); it++) {
00345                                         delete it->second;
00346                                 }
00347                         };
00348 
00349                         static void deleteArray(Json::Array arr)
00350                         {
00351                                 for (Json::Array::iterator it = arr.begin(); it != arr.end(); it++) {
00352                                         delete *it;
00353                                 }
00354                         };
